title: Moderate-speed city driving at night with clear skies.
caption: The ego vehicle drives down a city street at night, with moderate traffic and clear skies.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 6.8 m/s). There are 15 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a two-lane city street with parked cars on the right side. The traffic is moderate, with a few cars driving in the opposite direction. There are several traffic lights and street signs along the road. The weather is clear and the visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, following the traffic rules and maintaining a safe distance from other vehicles. It slows down when approaching intersections or pedestrian crossings. The driver is cautious and attentive, scanning the road for any potential risks or obstacles. The clear night visibility allows the driver to see clearly and make informed decisions.
